short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an UI to trigger github actions from within github.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Trigger repository_dispatch events to workflows from within github with a neat UI.
- Support for string, boolean and a dropdown/select.
- Select branches and/or tags from a github repository to include in the payload.
